works.complaint:
Dear Sir/Madam,

A Mr. Sean Sweeney has used his website: www.sweeneyit.com to create a  
webblog designed specifically to attack the reputation of the company  
Windows Media Ltd (of which I am sole director and 100% shareholder). We  
have now incurred substantial losses due to clients using google web
search  
to find us. We have had countless emails from clients wishing to cancel  
their contracts with ourselves due to reading the weblog created on  
www.sweeneyit.com. The defamatory content which is evident from the top  
three listings when running a standard google websearch on the  
name "Windows Media Ltd" is cited in various correspondence from clients  
who have refused to make payment of their invoices in light of the
comments  
(posted on www.sweeneyit.com) that they have read.
We have archived details of a large volume of complaints and cancellations
 
caused by the google search results appearing thanks to the activities of 

Mr. Sean Sweeney on www.sweeneyit.com and I will be instigating a legal  
suit for damages against Mr Sweeney.

In this instance, we acknowledge that this is not the direct fault of  
Google but now that you have been advised of the current situation we must
 
respectfully request that you cease and desist from displaying the results
 
pertaining to Windows Media Ltd on www.sweeney.com which appear when  
running a standard Google websearch on "Windows Media Ltd" and to remove  
any listings which link to the libellous weblog created on
www.sweeneyit.com

We would be most grateful if you could action this request within the  
earliest time frame you can in order to mitigate further losses for
Windows  
Media Ltd.

Warm regards

Sophie Holmes
Director
Name & Registered Office:
WINDOWS MEDIA LTD
KEMP HOUSE
152-160 CITY ROAD
LONDON
UNITED KINGDOM
EC1V 2NX
Company No. 07548784
